meanings.sent1: They dickered over the price of the car until they reached an agreement.

meanings.sent3: The siblings dickered playfully over who would get the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The two countries dickered for months before finally signing the peace treaty.
meanings.sent5: The students dickered with the teacher for extra credit opportunities.

meanings.sent5: The dickered market was bustling with activity as people tried to get the best deals.

meanings.sent1: After much discussion, they dickered on the terms of the contract.
